description: Here's how you can use GAPandas to create monthly marketing and ecommerce reports of your data in Pandas via the Google Analytics API.

title: How to create PDF reports in Python using Pandas and Gilfoyle
description: To save time, I created a Python package for generating PDF reports and presentations. Here's how you can use it to create automated ecommerce and marketing reports.

title: 15 ways you can use data science to boost ecommerce performance
description: There are dozens of use cases for ecommerce data science, covering everything from segmentation to uplift modeling. Here's a selection of 15 of the best.

title: How to create a simple product recommender system in Pandas
description: Collaborative filtering is so easy to use to create product recommendations that you can perform the entire process in Pandas. Here's how...

title: How to make time series forecasts with Neural Prophet
description: The Neural Prophet time series forecasting model was developed by Facebook and is a powerful tool for predicting future events.

title: How to scrape Google results in three lines of Python code
description: Here's a quick and easy way to scrape Google search engine results into a Pandas dataframe in just three lines of Python code...

title: How to create a basic Marketing Mix Model in scikit-learn
description: Marketing Mix Models (MMMs) let you test what marketing results you'll get from changing the amount you spend on marketing activity. Here's how to build one.

title: How to identify internal and external links using Python
description: Python is a powerful tool for identifying internal linking opportunities that help you improve SEO and reduce bounce rate. Here's how to apply it.

title: 19 Python SEO projects that will improve your site
description: Using Python for SEO is really catching on. There are loads of powerful ways you can use the language to improve your site and make your work more efficient. Here are 19 of the best.

title: How to auto-generate meta descriptions with EcommerceTools
description: Save yourself days of work by using deep learning to generate missing meta descriptions using the Bart text summarisation feature in EcommerceTools.

title: How to read an RSS feed in Python
description: Learn how to use Requests-HTML to read an RSS feed in Python, parse the feed contents, and write the text to a Pandas dataframe.

title: About me
description: The Practical Data Science website is written by Matt Clarke, a Digital Director and specialist in ecommerce, and marketing science.
